EmailTemplate.subject: The era of the Connected Aircraft is here. Will you join us?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Valued Customer,
With thousands of products on aircraft around the world, and more than 100 years of experience providing satellite communications, mechanical components, engines, cockpit technology and more to the aerospace industry, Honeywell is now taking the aviation industry into a new era of connectivity.
As an industry leader in Connected Aircraft solutions, we are proud to be Strategic Partner at the 2nd Connected Aircraft Conference taking place from 23-24 April 2018 at The Address Hotel, Dubai Mall, UAE. Join us at the conference to learn how to maximise the opportunities presented by next-gen aircraft such as improved passenger experience, reduced AOG, improved flight schedule integrity and improved safety. We also invite you to hear Kristin Slyker, Vice President, Connected Aircraft at Honeywell Aerospace deliver the Keynote Presentation on "The connected enterprise - the power of the connected world beyond aviation". You'll also hear from a leading line-up of speakers including:
- Dolf Beltz, VP Engineering and IT Systems, Emirates - Shajee Rafi, Manager Business Improvement, Emirates Engineering - Alia Al Qalam, Manager Development Engineering - Avionics, Oman Air - Werner Putzler, Manager - ACARS and Aircraft Communication, Etihad Airways
As a Honeywell customer, we invite you to take advantage of a 20% discount on the normal delegate rates. Simply register today using the link below and the promotional code 28157.002_HW. We look forward to welcoming you to the 2nd Connected Aircraft Conference later this month.
Paul Page Connectivity Sales Manager - Honeywell Aerospace MIddle East, Africa, India
